    • sendMessageToNeighbours

      public void sendMessageToNeighbours​(Message message, AsynchBFSImpl.Inte inte) throws java.lang.InterruptedException
      Sends a message to all neighbors, adding random delays in the time range of 1 to 15 milliseconds
      Parameters:
      message - the message to send to all neighbors
      Throws:
      java.lang.InterruptedException - since the Thread.sleep() function is being called
